title: Cinematic Odyssey 100 Tracks
description: Cinematic Odyssey Music Pack is a high-quality pack of 100 tracks for royalty-free use in video games, created by Bobby Cole.
longDescription:
"Cinematic Odyssey" by Bobby Cole offers 100 royalty-free tracks that bring cinematic grandeur to any project. This expansive collection ranges from sweeping orchestral compositions to intimate, nuanced scores, perfect for creating powerful emotional impacts in films and epic games.


Listen to my Cinematic Odyssey Sampler here: https://soundcloud.com/bobbycole/cinematic-odyssey-sampler


Once you've purchased this pack, feel free to contact me directly at hello@bobbycole.co.uk. I'm available to provide additional services such as track adjustments, consultation to select the best-suited tracks for your game, and custom music composition, all for an additional fee.


This Mega Pack includes 100 tracks:

  • 5 hours of music
  • 100 original high-quality tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

Â 

Tracks details:

  • Audio sample rate: 44.1 kHz
  • Format: .wav
  • Bit depth: 16 bit
  • Loopable: No
technicalDetails:

  • Anti Utopia

  • Dystopian World
  • Epic Warrior Underscore
  • Evocative Digital Symphony
  • God of Thunder
  • New World Order
  • Planet Battle
  • The Rise of Evil
  • and many more!


Number of Audio Wavs: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 hours 28 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
